mapper.select: SELECT m.`mid`,m.gid,m.mname,m.guidegprice,m.mtitle,b.`bphone`,b.bid,g.gname,m.configure FROM db_model m,db_business b ,db_goods g WHERE m.`gid`=g.`gid` AND g.bid=b.`bid` AND m.mid=#{mid} limit 0,1
select mid,gid,gname,mname,guidegprice,mshowImage,mtitle from db_model where guidegprice BETWEEN #{min} and #{max} and mid!=#{mid} order by guidegprice asc limit 10

SELECT m.mid,m.mname,m.guidegprice,m.gprice,m.mshowImage,g.title,g.bid,g.gname,g.maxprice,g.minprice,g.gid,g.stages12,g.stages24,g.stages36,m.mtitle,b.`bphone` FROM db_model m,view_goods_stages_title g,db_business b WHERE m.gid=g.gid AND g.bid=b.`bid` and g.gid=#{id}
SELECT b.`bid`,b.`bname`,b.`bphone`,m.`mname`,m.`mid`,g.`gid`,g.`gname` FROM db_model m,db_goods g,db_business b WHERE m.`gid`=g.`gid` AND g.`bid`=b.`bid` AND m.`mid`=#{mid}
select image from db_image where mid=#{mid}
select mid,mname,configure,guidegprice from db_model where mid=#{mid}
